title: AI Agent到底是什么？为什么2026年全在说它

sections.voiceoverText: AI Agent到底是什么？为什么2026年科技圈都在说它？
sections.bgPrompt: humanoid robot silhouette thinking, surrounded by glowing data streams and neural networks, dark blue background, cinematic

sections.displayText:
普通AI：你问一句
它答一句
sections.voiceoverText: 普通AI你问一句它答一句，像个问答机器。
sections.bgPrompt: simple chat bubble conversation on dark screen, minimal design, one question one answer, muted blue tones

sections.displayText:
AI Agent：你给它一个目标
它自己规划、执行、纠错
sections.voiceoverText: 但AI Agent不一样。你给它一个目标，它自己规划步骤、执行操作、遇到问题还会自己纠错。
sections.bgPrompt: complex flowchart with glowing nodes and connections, autonomous decision tree, bright cyan and purple on dark background, tech diagram

sections.displayText:
举个例子：
"帮我订明天北京到上海的机票"
sections.voiceoverText: 举个例子，你说帮我订明天北京到上海的机票。
sections.bgPrompt: airplane flying between two futuristic cities at night, digital booking interface overlay, neon lights, travel concept

sections.displayText:
它会：搜航班→比价→
选座→完成支付
sections.voiceoverText: 它会自动搜索航班、比较价格、选择座位、甚至完成支付。整个过程你不用动手。
sections.bgPrompt: multiple holographic screens showing flight search results and payment processing, futuristic UI, dark blue ambient

sections.displayText:
关键能力：
使用工具 + 多步推理
sections.voiceoverText: AI Agent的关键能力就两个：会使用各种工具，加上多步推理。这让它从聊天机器人变成了真正的数字助理。
sections.bgPrompt: robotic hands using multiple tools simultaneously, wrench hammer code keyboard, glowing workspace, dark industrial tech aesthetic

sections.displayText:
关注我
一起见证AI新时代
sections.voiceoverText: 关注我，一起见证AI Agent带来的新时代。
sections.bgPrompt: dramatic sunrise over digital landscape, new era concept, warm golden light breaking through dark tech cityscape
